articles.title: Stock Bulls Drive S&P 500 to the Brink of Record: Markets Wrap
articles.mainIdea: Stock Bulls Drive S&P 500 to the Brink of Record: Markets Wrap
articles.summary: Bloomberg: Stock Bulls Drive S&P 500 to the Brink of Record: Markets Wrap. Equities erased their December losses, with the S&P 500 set for an eighth straight up month - the longest winning run since 2018. Tesla Inc. and Nvidia Corp. led megacaps higher. Despite bouts of volatility and concerns about the AI trade, tech has led the market to the upside this year, and it will probably be the difference between a positive and negative December, said Chris Larkin at E*Trade from Morgan Stanley. Related tickers mentioned: DX-Y.NYB, GC=F, NVDA, TSLA, ^GSPC.

articles.title: Uber Stock Gains As It Races With Lyft To Test Baidu's Robotaxis In London
articles.mainIdea: Uber Stock Gains As It Races With Lyft To Test Baidu's Robotaxis In London
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Uber Stock Gains As It Races With Lyft To Test Baidu's Robotaxis In London. Uber stock gained after the tech giant said it would partner with Baidu to test robotaxis in London next year. Related tickers mentioned: BIDU, UBER.

articles.title: Watchdog Warns Uber Users To Take A Lyft Following NY Times Report That Uber Let Violent Felons, Rapists Drive, Background Check System Built To Fail, Says Consumer Watchdog
articles.mainIdea: Watchdog Warns Uber Users To Take A Lyft Following NY Times Report That Uber Let Violent Felons, Rapists Drive, Background Check System Built To Fail, Says Consumer Watchdog
articles.summary: PR Newswire: Watchdog Warns Uber Users To Take A Lyft Following NY Times Report That Uber Let Violent Felons, Rapists Drive, Background Check System Built To Fail, Says Consumer Watchdog.
